attributes.action: To ask the Government : To Label TB Infected Meat & Meat Products from UK Cattle
attributes.additional_details:
To ask the Government : To Label TB Infected Meat & Meat Products from bTB positive UK Cattle that have been allowed into the foodchain and deemed fit for human consumption.

The Government is fully aware that there is a risk (however small) of Consumers contracting Bovine TB from Meat or Meat Products from Infected Animals.

Product from Infected Animals is routinely supplied to Schools & Hospitals, with those Consumers particularly vulnerable.

Let the Consumer choose whether or not they consume Infected Meat.

For and on behalf of our Children, Elderly, Infirm & General Public.
